answers.answer: Congrats and welcome to team blue!When your due date again?
Well, according to yesterday's ultrasound, it's been moved up to Dec. 22, 2008!  >.>  I may have a Christmas baby on my hands!  ...DH and I joked about naming him Jesus.  lol

That's funny..They have changed my due date 5 times so far due to u/s but my Dr. sayd the first one is most accurate so I am sticking with 1/18/09.I just hope my boy stays in there and all these scares end. I cant take much more! I just want him to be healthy and normal!I love the name Jaiden.I have decided to name my son Jaxson Paul!

Ooooohhhh ...I love the name Jaxson too!  Aside from it just being a great name, I thought it would be a nice homage to my 'hometown' (Jacksonville, FL).  That was one of my boy names if we had more than one boy ...but I think the next one (if we end up with another boy!) will be Johlin (Joel-in).I read about your scare on another post!  I, too, had a scare ...it wasn't as scary as yours sounded tho!  Don't worry about the preeclampsia.  Like Lance said in that other post, it could have been something you ate that day ...and if it wasn't, at least they were able to catch it early and can keep a close eye on you and Jaxson!!  =D
Yayyyy Go Blue Team! Congrats on your little boy
Welcome to Team Blue! Im having my 3rd boy any day now!
Congrats!! We just had our baby boy on 9/27. Boys are wonderful!! :)

question: After a scare on Monday, we ended up getting a full anatomy scan scheduled for yesterday, instead of me having to wait till the end of October for my next appointment.DH and I decided on Monday that we would find out the sex of the baby ... mostly, our main reason for not finding out was that we didn't think we'd be having an u/s done due to insurance reasons.  It was just easier to say "We're going to let it be a surprise" than explain the whole insurance thing.  =DSoooooo ... Our little Baby Ohz is a BOY!!!  =D  His name will be Jaiden Thomas ... we've had our names picked out for forever.  =D  It's great to be able to definitively call the baby HE, HIM, and by his name.  =D  And now we get to be all decked out in blue!!  =D  Yay!!!I posted pictures on my profile, and I also wrote about my appointment on my blog:  jessaknight.blogspot.comYay for Boys!!!!
title: We caved in !!!
